description: An addendum to the Second Judicial District administrative plan explains that the Veterans Diversion Program was implemented in 2015 through SAMHSA’s Adult Treatment Court Collaborative funding.  Local partners collaborated to address veterans’ needs.  The program also secured a Bureau of Justice Assistance grant to enhance services and operates a voluntary pre‑conviction, post‑plea program with intensive supervision and mandatory treatment.
source: Addendum to the 2020 Plan of the Second Judicial District (Veterans Diversion Program)
quote: Through funding from the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration's (SAMHSA) Adult Treatment Court Collaborative Funding, the Arkansas Second Judicial District Veterans Diversion Program was implemented in 2015 ... funding was recently obtained through the Bureau of Justice Assistance's Adult Drug Court Discretionary Funding to enhance the services provided by the court 【581215623174875†L8-L33】
